Umineko Project (UP): That's right. Just once in the past, I underwent training in order to step into the world of witches.
Steam (ST): That's right. Just once in the past, I underwent training in order to step into the world of witches.
PC Japanese (JP): そう。私はかつて一度だけ、魔女の世界に足を踏み入れるべく、修行をしたことがある。
Russian (RU): Точно. Однажды в прошлом я прошла подготовку, которая должна была позволить мне войти в мир ведьм.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Isso mesmo. No passado, eu passei por um treinamento para poder adentrar o mundo das bruxas.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 對。我曾經一度踏入過魔女的世界，進行過修行。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 对。我曾经一度踏入过魔女的世界，进行过修行。

Umineko Project (UP): I accepted that the only power which could save me from my sad, painful days at Saint Lucia Academy...was the thing called magic, and I received Maria onee‐chan's introduction to the basics......
Steam (ST): I accepted that the only power that could save me from those sad, painful days at Saint Lucia Academy... was the thing called magic, and I received Maria's introduction to the basics...
PC Japanese (JP): 聖ルチーア学園での辛く悲しい日々から私を救ってくれる力が、魔法だけだということを受け入れ、真里亞お姉ちゃんにその手解きを受けたのだ……。
Russian (RU): Я приняла тот факт, что единственной силой, способной спасти меня от печальных, истязающих душу дней в академии Святой Люции, была вещь под названием "магия", а Мария ввела меня в основы......
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Aceitei que o único poder que poderia me salvar dos meus tristes e dolorosos dias na Academia Santa Lucia...era esta coisa chamada magia, e a Maria onee‐chan me introduziu aos seus conceitos básicos......
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 認同了，只有魔法，才能使我在聖露琪亞學園的辛酸悲慘的日子中獲得救贖，接受了真里亞姐姐的啟蒙教導……。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 认同了，只有魔法，才能使我在圣露琪亚学园的辛酸悲惨的日子中获得救赎，接受了真里亚姐姐的启蒙教导……。

Speaker: Ushiromiya Ange
Umineko Project (UP): "...............Imagine...a vast space...... ......The scenery when I looked down at the base of the mountain, from the rest stop at the peak......"
Steam (ST): "......Imagine...a vast space... ...The scene from when I looked down at the mountain's base from a rest stop at the peak...
PC Japanese (JP): 「……………広大な空間を、イメージ……。……峠のドライブインから麓を見下ろした時の風景……。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「……………広大な空間を、イメージ……。……峠のドライブインから麓を見下ろした時の風景……」
Russian (RU): "............Представь... огромное пространство... ......Пейзаж, увиденный мною, когда я посмотрела вниз на подножие, остановившись отдохнуть на вершине......"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "...............Imagine...um vasto espaço...... ......O cenário quando eu olhava para baixo, para a base de uma montanha, para o resto que parou no topo......"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……………想像廣大的空間……。……去想從山頂餐廳俯瞰山腳時所見的風景……」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……………想象广大的空间……。……去想从山顶餐厅俯瞰山脚时所见的风景……」

Speaker: Ushiromiya Ange
Steam (ST): ......Like this...?"

Umineko Project (UP): I projected that scene from a memory into my mental world.
Steam (ST): I projected that scene from a memory into my mental world.
PC Japanese (JP): 私はその思い出の中の風景を、心象世界に投影した。
Russian (RU): Я перенесла это зрелище из памяти в свой духовный мир.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eu projetei essa cena de uma memória em meu mundo mental.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 我將記憶中的風景投影到了心象世界。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 我将记忆中的风景投影到了心象世界。

Umineko Project (UP): ......Normal little girls get over their admiration of magical girls during elementary school.
Steam (ST): ...Normal girls get over their fascination with magical girls when they leave elementary school.
PC Japanese (JP): ……魔法少女に憧れるなんて、普通の女の子なら小学校で卒業する。
Russian (RU): ......Нормальные девочки перестают восхищаться девочками‐ведьмами, когда оканчивают начальную школу.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Garotas normais superam suas admirações por garotas mágicas durante o fundamental.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……憧憬於當魔法少女，這是一般女孩子在上小學時就會扔掉的夢想。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……憧憬于当魔法少女，这是一般女孩子在上小学时就会扔掉的梦想。

Umineko Project (UP): Training in absolute earnest to use magic at this age......I have to say, I'm embarrassed of myself.
Steam (ST): So seriously training to use magic at this age...was embarrassing even for me.
PC Japanese (JP): だから、こんな歳にもなって、大真面目に魔法の修行をしてるなんて、……我ながら恥ずかしい。
Russian (RU): Таким образом, серьёзно учиться использовать магию в этом возрасте... смущало даже меня.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Treinar com absoluta sinceridade para usar magia nessa idade......eu preciso admitir que estou com vergonha de mim mesma.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 所以，到這歲數了還去一本正經地修行魔法，……連自己都感到害臊。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 所以，到这岁数了还去一本正经地修行魔法，……连自己都感到害臊。

Umineko Project (UP): But even that embarrassed emotion felt pleasant to me now.
Steam (ST): But even that embarrassed feeling felt pleasant to me now.
PC Japanese (JP): でも、その恥ずかしいという感情すらも、今の私には微笑ましいものだった。
Russian (RU): Но в данный момент мне даже было приятно ощущать это смущение.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Mas mesmo essa emoção vergonhosa é agradável para mim agora.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 不過，對此刻的我來說，就連這份羞恥之情，都已成為值得欣慰之物。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 不过，对此刻的我来说，就连这份羞耻之情，都已成为值得欣慰之物。

Umineko Project (UP): Right now, I was learning mental concentration from Maria onee‐chan in order to use magic.
Steam (ST): Right then, I was learning mental concentration from Maria onee-chan, in order to use magic.
PC Japanese (JP): 私は今、真里亞お姉ちゃんに魔法を使うための精神集中を習っている。
Russian (RU): Сейчас я училась духовной концентрации от Марии онее‐чан, чтобы использовать магию.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Agora, eu estava aprendendo sobre concentração mental com a Maria onee‐chan para poder usar magia.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 我此刻正在跟真里亞姐姐學習，為了使用魔法而集中精神之法。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 我此刻正在跟真里亚姐姐学习，为了使用魔法而集中精神之法。

Umineko Project (UP): But it wasn't going very well. ......It was about as hopeless as going to a person who can wiggle their ears, asking them how they do it, and expecting to learn anything at all from their demonstration...
Steam (ST): But it wasn't going very well. ...It was about as hopeless as teaching a person to wiggle their ears by showing them... and expecting to learn anything at all from their demonstration...
PC Japanese (JP): だが、なかなかうまく出来ない。……まるで、耳を動かせる人に、こうやって動かすんだよと実演されても、どうしようもないのによく似てる…。
Russian (RU): Но выходило не очень хорошо. ......Это было так же безнадёжно, как учить человека шевелить ушами, показывая, как это делается на себе...Похоже, что тебе нужно представить огромное пространство, чтобы достигнуть духовной концентрации для использования магии.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Mas não estava indo muito bem. ......Eu sou tão desesperada assim como alguém que vai até outra pessoa capaz de mexer as orelhas, e a pergunta como fazer aquilo, esperando aprender algo a partir das demonstrações dela...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 不過，進行得頗不順利。……就像即便是由耳朵會動的人當場演示了，怎麼將耳朵動起來，也還是怎麼都學不會一樣…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 不过，进行得颇不顺利。……就像即便是由耳朵会动的人当场演示了，怎么将耳朵动起来，也还是怎么都学不会一样…。

Umineko Project (UP): It seems that you need to imagine a vast space to gain the mental concentration for using magic.
Steam (ST): It seems that you need to imagine a vast space to gain the mental concentration for using magic.
PC Japanese (JP): 魔法を使うための精神集中には、広大な空間のイメージが欠かせないらしい。
Russian (RU): Поэтому я вспомнила время, когда была гораздо моложе, а моя семья поехала в небольшой отпуск.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Parece que você precisa imaginar um vasto espaço para adquirir concentração mental a fim de usar magia.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 在為了使用魔法而集中精神這事上，去想像廣大的空間似乎是必不可缺的一環。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 在为了使用魔法而集中精神这事上，去想象广大的空间似乎是必不可缺的一环。

Umineko Project (UP): So I remembered the time from my younger days when my family had gone on a small vacation, and I had looked down towards the base of a mountain from a viewing platform at a rest stop on the peak—and I tried painting this scene in my mental world.
Steam (ST): So I remembered the time from my younger days when my family had gone on a small vacation, when I had looked down towards the base from a viewing platform at a rest stop on a peak, and I tried painting this scene in my mental world.
PC Japanese (JP): なので私は、幼い頃に家族で出掛けた小旅行で、峠のドライブインの展望台から麓を見下ろした時のことを思い出し、その光景で心象世界を描いてみたのだ。
Russian (RU): Там мне довелось посмотреть вниз на подножие со смотровой площадки, когда я остановилась передохнуть на вершине. Теперь же я попыталась нарисовать эту картину в своём духовном мире.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Então, eu lembrei da época em que eu era criança, quando minha família foi em uma pequena viagem de férias e, de uma plataforma no topo de uma montanha onde paramos para descansar, eu olhei para a base dela — e eu tentei pintar essa cena em meu mundo mental.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 所以，我回憶起了，小時候與家人一起出門的小旅行，在山頂餐廳的展望台俯視山腳時的情景，以這景色描繪出心象世界。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 所以，我回忆起了，小时候与家人一起出门的小旅行，在山顶餐厅的展望台俯视山脚时的情景，以这景色描绘出心象世界。

Speaker: Ushiromiya Maria
Umineko Project (UP): "No, still far too small. Imagine a much, much wider space. And create your very own mental world."
Steam (ST): "No, still far too small. Imagine a much, much wider space. And create your own mental world.
PC Japanese (JP): 「うぅん、まだまだ狭い。もっともっと広い空間をイメージして。そして、縁寿だけの心象世界を作り上げるの。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「うぅん、まだまだ狭い。もっともっと広い空間をイメージして。そして、縁寿だけの心象世界を作り上げるの」
Russian (RU): "Нет, всё ещё слишком маленькое. Представь большое‐большое широкое пространство. И создай свой духовный мир."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Não, ainda é muito pequeno. Imagine um espaço muito, muito mais vasto.{n}E crie seu próprio mundo mental."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「不行，還太狹小。去想像更大更廣闊的空間。然後，去創造出只屬於緣壽的心象世界。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「不行，还太狭小。去想象更大更广阔的空间。然后，去创造出只属于缘寿的心象世界。」

Speaker: Ushiromiya Maria
Umineko Project (UP): "Your image is still far too foggy. There's no temperature in the air, and there's no wind. No smells either. The world is still very thin. ......You can leave those for later, so for now, just imagine a wider space."
Steam (ST): Your image is still way too foggy. There's no temperature in the air, and there's no wind. No smells either. The world is still very faint. ...You can leave those for later, so for now, imagine an even wider space."
PC Japanese (JP): まだまだイメージが霞んでる。空気に温度もないし、風もない。匂いもない。まだまだ世界が希薄。……それらは後でもいいから、今はとにかく、もっと広い世界をイメージして。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「まだまだイメージが霞んでる。空気に温度もないし、風もない。匂いもない。まだまだ世界が希薄。……それらは後でもいいから、今はとにかく、もっと広い世界をイメージして」
Russian (RU): "Твой образ всё ещё слишком смутный. Там нет температуры воздуха и даже ветра. Также нет запахов. Мир по‐прежнему очень тусклый. ......Ты можешь оставить его на потом, а сейчас, представь широкое пространство."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Sua imagem ainda está muito embaçada. Não há temperatura no ar, e também não há vento. Muito menos cheiros. O mundo ainda está muito fino. ......Você pode deixar isso para depois, por hora, apenas imagine um vasto espaço."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「印象還太朦朧。空氣沒有溫度，沒有風。沒有氣味。世界還太稀薄。……這些以後再做也行，總之，現在先去想像更廣闊的世界。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「印象还太朦胧。空气没有温度，没有风。没有气味。世界还太稀薄。……这些以后再做也行，总之，现在先去想象更广阔的世界。」

Speaker: Sakutarou
Umineko Project (UP): ‘Uryu. ......Why do you have to imagine a wide space?’
Steam (ST): ‘Uryu. ...Why do you have to imagine a vast space?’
PC Japanese (JP): 『うりゅ。……どうして広い空間のイメージが必要なの？』
Russian (RU): {p:0:『}Урю. ......Зачем надо представлять огромное пространство?{p:0:』}
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ‘Uryu. ......Por que você precisa imaginar um espaço vasto?’
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 『嗚溜。……為什麼必須去想像廣闊的空間？』
Chinese Simplified (CN): 『呜溜。……为什么必须去想象广阔的空间？』

Speaker: Ushiromiya Maria
Umineko Project (UP): "From the time they're born, {y:0:Human}{n:0:human}s have inside them a toxin that blocks magic. If you don't purge yourself of that toxin, you can't use magic well. ...One effective method of achieving this is to imagine a vast space."
Steam (ST): "From the time of their birth, Humans have inside of them a toxin that blocks magic. If that toxin isn't purified, you can't use magic well. ...One effective method of achieving this is to imagine a vast space."
PC Japanese (JP): 「ニンゲンの体内には、生まれながらにして魔法を妨げる毒素があるんだよ。その毒素を浄化しないと、魔法はうまく使えないの。…その為に有効な方法の一つが、広大な空間をイメージすることなんだよ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「ニンゲンの体内には、生まれながらにして魔法を妨げる毒素があるんだよ。その毒素を浄化しないと、魔法はうまく使えないの。…その為に有効な方法の一つが、広大な空間をイメージすることなんだよ」
Russian (RU): "С момента их рождения у {y:0:Люд}{n:0:люд}ей внутри есть токсин, блокирующий магию. Если не очиститься от этого токсина, то ты не сможешь как следует пользоваться магией. ...Единственным эффективным методом достижения этого является представление огромного пространства."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "A partir do momento que nascem, {y:0:Humanos}{n:0:humanos} têm dentro de si uma toxina que bloqueia a magia. Se você não expurgar essas toxinas, não vai conseguir usar magia. ...Um método efetivo para conseguir isto é imaginar um vasto espaço."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「在人類的體內，一出生就帶有妨礙魔法的毒素喲。不去淨化這毒素，就沒法好好用出魔法。…淨化毒素的有效方法之一，就是去想像廣大的空間喲。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「在人类的体内，一出生就带有妨碍魔法的毒素哟。不去净化这毒素，就没法好好用出魔法。…净化毒素的有效方法之一，就是去想象广大的空间哟。」

Speaker: Ushiromiya Ange
Umineko Project (UP): ".........Just now, I thought of the world as seen from the window of an airplane, but that didn't work either. ......A world more vast than that, ......I can't even imagine."
Steam (ST): "......Just now, I thought of the world as seen from the window of an airplane, but that didn't work. ...I can't even think of... a world more vast than that."
PC Japanese (JP): 「………さっきは、飛行機の窓から見た世界を思い描いたけど、それも駄目だったわ。……もっと広大な世界なんて、……見当もつかない。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「………さっきは、飛行機の窓から見た世界を思い描いたけど、それも駄目だったわ。……もっと広大な世界なんて、……見当もつかない」
Russian (RU): ".........Сейчас я думала о мире, видимом из окна самолёта, но это не сработало. ......Я не могу даже представить... мир, намного больше, чем этот."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ".........Agora, eu pensei em um mundo como se visto da janela de um avião, mas também não funcionou. ......Um mundo ainda mais vasto que isto, ......eu não consigo imaginar."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「………剛才描繪過從飛機機窗看到的世界，可是連這也不行。……比這更廣大的世界，……毫無頭緒。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「………刚才描绘过从飞机机窗看到的世界，可是连这也不行。……比这更广大的世界，……毫无头绪。」

Speaker: Sakutarou
Umineko Project (UP): ‘In that case, Maria, why don't you just tell Ange about the vast world you have...! Won't that make it easy for Ange to imagine as well? Uryu!’
Steam (ST): ‘In that case, Maria just has to teach Ange about the vast world Maria has...! Won't that make it easy for Ange to imagine as well? Uryu!’
PC Japanese (JP): 『なら、真里亞の持つ広大な世界を縁寿にも教えてあげればいいよ…！　そしたら縁寿にもイメージがしやすくなるんじゃない？　うりゅ！』
Russian (RU): {p:0:『}В таком случае Мария просто должна рассказать Энджи о том громадном мире, который есть у Марии!.. Разве это не сделает создание проще для Энджи? Урю!{p:0:』}
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ‘Nesse caso, Maria, por que você não conta para a Ange sobre como seu mundo é vasto...! Isso não faria com que fosse mais fácil para a Ange imaginar? Uryu!’
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 『那麼，真里亞去把真里亞所擁有的廣大世界教給緣壽就好了喲…！這麼做了的話，緣壽不也就能比較輕鬆地進行想像了嗎？嗚溜！』
Chinese Simplified (CN): 『那么，真里亚去把真里亚所拥有的广大世界教给缘寿就好了哟…！这么做了的话，缘寿不也就能比较轻松地进行想象了吗？呜溜！』

Speaker: Ushiromiya Ange
Umineko Project (UP): "......That's right. And I'm interested in the kind of world you imagine when you use magic, too, Onee‐chan. ...I'll use it as a reference as well."
Steam (ST): "...That's right. And, I'm interested in the kind of world Onee-chan imagines when she uses magic. ...I'll use it for reference."
PC Japanese (JP): 「……そうね。私も、お姉ちゃんはどんな世界をイメージして魔法を使ってるのか、興味があるわ。…私もそれを参考にする。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「……そうね。私も、お姉ちゃんはどんな世界をイメージして魔法を使ってるのか、興味があるわ。…私もそれを参考にする」
Russian (RU): "......Верно. Мне тоже интересно, что за мир представляет себе Мария онее‐чан, когда использует магию. ...Тогда я тоже воспользуюсь им."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Isso mesmo. Eu estou interessada em que tipo de mundo você imagina quando usa magia, onee‐chan. ...Eu irei usá‐lo como uma referência."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……是呢。我也對姐姐使用魔法時想像著怎樣的世界很感興趣哦。…我也從中借鑑一下。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……是呢。我也对姐姐使用魔法时想象着怎样的世界很感兴趣哦。…我也从中借鉴一下。」

Speaker: Ushiromiya Maria
Umineko Project (UP): "Uu, won't work. The mental world must be vast and isolated. A world with absolutely no obstructions other than yourself."
Steam (ST): "Uu-, that won't work. The mental world must be vast and isolated. A world with no obstructions other than yourself.
PC Japanese (JP): 「うー、駄目だよ。心象世界は広大で、そして孤独じゃないといけないの。自分以外に一切遮るものがない世界。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「うー、駄目だよ。心象世界は広大で、そして孤独じゃないといけないの。自分以外に一切遮るものがない世界」
Russian (RU): "У‐у, не сработает. Духовный мир должен быть обширен и изолирован. Мир, в котором нет препятствий кроме тебя."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Uu, não funciona. O mundo mental precisa ser vasto e isolado. Um mundo sem quaisquer obstruções além de você mesma."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「嗚——，不行。心象世界必須是既廣大又孤獨，除自己外無任何阻礙的世界。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「呜——，不行。心象世界必须是既广大又孤独，除自己外无任何阻碍的世界。」

Speaker: Ushiromiya Maria
Umineko Project (UP): "......Which means, if you tell someone about that world, it won't be isolated anymore. So you can't reveal your mental world to anyone. So if you manage to draw up a good mental world, you have to keep it a secret only for yourself."
Steam (ST): ...So, if you teach someone about that world, it won't be isolated anymore. That's why you mustn't reveal your mental world to anyone. And if you draw up a good mental world, you too must keep it as a secret only for yourself."
PC Japanese (JP): ……だから、その世界を人に教えたら、その世界は孤独ではなくなってしまう。だから心象世界は誰にも明かしちゃ駄目なの。だから縁寿も、上手に心象世界を描けたら、それは自分だけの秘密の世界にするんだよ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「……だから、その世界を人に教えたら、その世界は孤独ではなくなってしまう。だから心象世界は誰にも明かしちゃ駄目なの。だから縁寿も、上手に心象世界を描けたら、それは自分だけの秘密の世界にするんだよ」
Russian (RU): "......Поэтому, если ты расскажешь другому человеку об этом мире, он больше не будет изолирован. Таким образом, ты не должна показывать свой духовный мир никому. Поэтому, если ты нарисовала хороший духовный мир, ты также должна держать его в секрете только для себя."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......O que significa que se você falar a alguém sobre esse mundo, ele não será mais isolado. Por isso você não pode revelar seu mundo mental para ninguém.{n}Se você conseguir compor um bom mundo mental, você precisa mantê‐lo em segredo apenas para si."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……所以，將這個世界告訴別人，這個世界就會不再孤獨。所以，心象世界不能向任何人道出。所以，在緣壽能漂亮地描繪出心象世界後，得將此當成只屬於自己的秘密世界喲。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……所以，将这个世界告诉别人，这个世界就会不再孤独。所以，心象世界不能向任何人道出。所以，在缘寿能漂亮地描绘出心象世界后，得将此当成只属于自己的秘密世界哟。」

Speaker: Sakutarou

Steam (ST): ‘Uryu... So stingy, Maria...’

Umineko Project (UP): "Thanks, Sakutaro. I guess there are no shortcuts in training. ......I'll make an effort. It's alright, I've been given plenty of hints."
Steam (ST): "Thanks, Sakutaro. I guess there are no shortcuts in training. ...I'll make an effort. It's okay, I've been given plenty of hints."

Russian (RU): "Спасибо, Сакутаро. Что ж, полагаю, в обучении нет кратчайших путей. ......Я приложу все усилия. Всё нормально, я получила уйму подсказок."

Speaker: Sakutarou
Umineko Project (UP): ‘Uryu...! Do your best, Ange...!’
Steam (ST): ‘Uryu...! Do your best, Ange...!’
PC Japanese (JP): 『うりゅ…！　縁寿、がんばれ…！』
Russian (RU): {p:0:『}Урю!.. Постарайся, Энджи!..{p:0:』}
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ‘Uryu...! Faça o seu melhor, Ange...!’
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 『嗚溜…！緣壽，加油…！』
Chinese Simplified (CN): 『呜溜…！缘寿，加油…！』

Umineko Project (UP): I had come to think that there was no way I could be saved by something like magic.{n}After all, magic doesn't exist in this world.{n}That kind of thing should be nothing more than a fantasy, a delusion, a daydream.
Steam (ST): Until recently, I thought there was no way something like magic could save me. After all, magic doesn't exist in this world. That kind of thing's supposedly nothing more than an illusion, a delusion, a daydream.
PC Japanese (JP): 魔法なんかで救われるわけがないと、思ってきた。だって、この世には魔法なんて存在しない。そんなものは、幻想、妄想、白昼夢に過ぎないはず。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 魔法なんかで救われるわけがないと、思ってきた。{n}だって、この世には魔法なんて存在しない。{n}そんなものは、幻想、妄想、白昼夢に過ぎないはず。
Russian (RU): Я пришла к мнению, что не могу быть спасена чем‐то вроде магии.{n}В конце концов, в этом мире магии не существует.{n}Такого рода вещь, предположительно, не более чем иллюзия, наваждение, мечта.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eu comecei a pensar que não há como eu ser salva por algo como magia.{n}Afinal, a magia não existe nesse mundo.{n}Esse tipo de coisa não deveria ser mais do que uma fantasia, uma delusão, um devaneio.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 我一直以為，人不可能被魔法救贖。{n}畢竟，這個世上根本不存在什麼魔法。{n}那種東西理應只不過是幻想、妄想、白日夢。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 我一直以为，人不可能被魔法救赎。{n}毕竟，这个世上根本不存在什么魔法。{n}那种东西理应只不过是幻想、妄想、白日梦。

Umineko Project (UP): ......However, Maria onee‐chan had shown that she could fill her own world with happiness using a power that was impossible for me.
Steam (ST): ...However, Maria onee-chan showed me that she could fill her own world with happiness using a power that's impossible for me.
PC Japanese (JP): ……でも、真里亞お姉ちゃんは、私には持ち得ない力で、自らの世界を幸せで満たして見せた。
Russian (RU): ......Однако Мария онее‐чан показала, что может наполнить мир счастьем, используя силу, которая была для меня невозможной.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Entretanto, a Maria onee‐chan mostrou que ela pode preencher seu próprio mundo com felicidade usando um poder que era impossível para mim.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……但是，我看到了，真里亞姐姐以我所沒有的力量，將自己的世界注滿了幸福。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……但是，我看到了，真里亚姐姐以我所没有的力量，将自己的世界注满了幸福。

Umineko Project (UP): I had been looking down on that happiness as an empty happiness.
Steam (ST): I used to look down on that happiness as something empty.
PC Japanese (JP): 私はその幸せを、虚しい幸せだと見下してきた。
Russian (RU): Я привыкла смотреть свысока на это счастье, полагая его пустым.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eu costumava ver essa felicidade como uma felicidade vazia.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 我曾一直將這幸福鄙視為虛無的幸福。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 我曾一直将这幸福鄙视为虚无的幸福。

Umineko Project (UP): ......I had been denying it all, thinking that because I didn't accept magic, I couldn't accept the happiness that came from it either.
Steam (ST): ...Because I didn't believe in magic, I also denied everything else, refusing to believe in the happiness that magic gave birth to.
PC Japanese (JP): ……魔法なんて認めないから、そこから生まれた幸せも認めないと、全てを否定してきた。
Russian (RU): ......Я всё отрицала, считая, что поскольку я не принимала магию, я не могла принять то счастье, которое исходило от неё.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Eu vinha negando tudo isso, pensando que era por não aceitar a magia que eu não podia aceitar a felicidade que vinha dela.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……不承認魔法，所以也不承認從此誕生出來的幸福，如此全盤否定。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……不承认魔法，所以也不承认从此诞生出来的幸福，如此全盘否定。

Umineko Project (UP): But Maria onee‐chan's world grew happier and happier.
Steam (ST): But slowly, bit by bit, Maria onee-chan's world grew happier.
PC Japanese (JP): でも、真里亞お姉ちゃんの世界はどんどん、どんどん、幸せになっていく。
Russian (RU): Но постепенно, шаг за шагом, мир Марии онее‐чан наполнялся счастьем.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Mas o mundo da Maria onee‐chan ficava cada vez mais feliz.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 可是，真里亞姐姐的世界卻一個勁兒地變得越來越幸福。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 可是，真里亚姐姐的世界却一个劲儿地变得越来越幸福。

Umineko Project (UP): In the past, I had disparaged it, calling it painful to look at.
Steam (ST): In the past, I'd disparaged it, thinking it too pitiful to look at.
PC Japanese (JP): かつて私はそれを、痛々しくて見てられないと扱き下ろした。
Russian (RU): В прошлом я пренебрегала этим, думая, что на это жалко смотреть.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): No passado, eu havia depreciado isso, dizendo que era doloroso de se olhar.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 以前的我一直將此貶低為，令人心酸得看不下去。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 以前的我一直将此贬低为，令人心酸得看不下去。

Umineko Project (UP): But......that might have been nothing more than jealousy.{n}It was time for me to admit that.
Steam (ST): But...that might've been nothing more than jealousy. I was forced to admit that.
PC Japanese (JP): しかし、……それは妬みに過ぎなかったのかもしれない。私は、それを認めなければならなかった。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): しかし、……それは妬みに過ぎなかったのかもしれない。{n}私は、それを認めなければならなかった。
Russian (RU): Однако же... это была не более чем зависть.{n}Мне пришлось признать это.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Mas......pode ser que isso não fosse mais do que inveja.{n}Era hora de admitir isso.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 然而，……這或許只不過是嫉妒。{n}我，必須去承認它。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 然而，……这或许只不过是嫉妒。{n}我，必须去承认它。

Umineko Project (UP): And doing so was my first step in my search for happiness...
Steam (ST): And now, this was my first step in my search for happiness...
PC Japanese (JP): そしてそれこそが、私の幸せ探しの第一歩だったのだ…。
Russian (RU): И это стало моим первым шагом в поисках счастья...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): E fazer isso era o primeiro passo na minha busca pela felicidade...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 而承認它即是，尋找我的幸福的第一步…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 而承认它即是，寻找我的幸福的第一步…。

Umineko Project (UP): A vast space. A dry wind that can blow unobstructed by everything.{n}......Let me feel that wind blowing through my hair.
Steam (ST): A vast space. A dry wind that could blow without being blocked by anything. ...Let me feel that wind blowing through my own hair.
PC Japanese (JP): 広大な空間。何物にも遮られずに吹き抜ける乾いた風。……その風が自分の髪を散らすのを感じよう。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 広大な空間。何物にも遮られずに吹き抜ける乾いた風。{n}……その風が自分の髪を散らすのを感じよう。
Russian (RU): Огромное пространство. Холодный ветер, который может дуть, не встречая препятствий.{n}......Дай мне почувствовать этот ветер в моих собственных волосах.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Um vasto espaço. Um vento seco que pode soprar sem qualquer obstrução.{n}......Deixe‐me sentar nesse vento que sopra através do meu cabelo.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 廣大的空間。不受任何阻攔地翱翔的乾爽的風。{n}……去感到這股風在吹散自己的頭髮。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 广大的空间。不受任何阻拦地翱翔的干爽的风。{n}……去感到这股风在吹散自己的头发。

Umineko Project (UP): ......Oh...yes, even the ground might block me as I am now.
Steam (ST): ...I see, ...even the ground might get in my way as I am now.
PC Japanese (JP): ……そうか、大地さえも、今の私には妨げるものなのかもしれない。
Russian (RU): ......Понятно... Даже земля может остановить меня такой, кем я сейчас являюсь.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Ah...sim, mesmo o chão pode me bloquear da forma como estou agora.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……對了，對現在的我來說，說不定連大地都是個阻礙。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……对了，对现在的我来说，说不定连大地都是个阻碍。

Umineko Project (UP): Then I don't need it.
Steam (ST): Then, I don't need a ground.
PC Japanese (JP): じゃあ、大地なんていらないや。
Russian (RU): Тогда мне не нужна земля.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Então eu não preciso dele.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 那麼，我不需要大地。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 那么，我不需要大地。

Umineko Project (UP): ............Push the ground away, downwards, downwards.
Steam (ST): ......Brush the ground away, downwards, downwards.
PC Japanese (JP): …………大地を押しのけて、下方の彼方へ、彼方へ。
Russian (RU): .........Отмахнуться от земли — прочь, вниз, вниз.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ............Empurre o chão para longe, para baixo, para baixo.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …………將大地推開，朝下方的下方遠遠推去。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …………将大地推开，朝下方的下方远远推去。

Umineko Project (UP): In other words, ......it was as though I had floated up, leaving the ground far behind.
Steam (ST): In other words, ...it was as though I had floated up, leaving the ground far behind.
PC Japanese (JP): それはつまり、………私が大地から遠く離れて、浮かび上がったのと同じこと。
Russian (RU): Другими словами... Я словно воспарила, оставляя землю далеко позади.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Em outras palavras, ......como se eu estivesse flutuando, ficando cada vez mais distante do chão.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 換言之，………這就等同於我遠離大地，浮上天空。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 换言之，………这就等同于我远离大地，浮上天空。

Umineko Project (UP): After pushing it further and further downwards, ...the ground grew foggy and faint, ......and for the first time, I began to feel the sky.
Steam (ST): After pushing the ground further and further downwards, ...the ground grew foggy and faint, ...and for the first time, it began to feel like the sky.
PC Japanese (JP): どんどん大地を下方に押しのけると、…地上が霞んで淡くなり、……初めて大空を感じるようになる。
Russian (RU): Земля всё отдалялась и отдалялась от меня, пока не стала смутной и тусклой... И я впервые испытала ощущение неба.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Depois de empurrar ele cada vez mais para baixo, ...o chão começou a ficar embaçado e esvanecido, ......pela primeira vez, comecei a sentir o céu.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 將大地朝下方遠遠推開後，…地面的景色變得朦朧不清，……我得以首次感受到了天空。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 将大地朝下方远远推开后，…地面的景色变得朦胧不清，……我得以首次感受到了天空。

Umineko Project (UP): .........Then, I understood its vastness.
Steam (ST): ......Then, I understood its vastness.
PC Japanese (JP): ………そして私は広大さを知る。
Russian (RU): .........Тогда я поняла эти просторы.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): .........Então, eu entendi sua vastidão.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ………然後，我獲知了，天空是有多廣大。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ………然后，我获知了，天空是有多广大。

Umineko Project (UP): In that instant, I felt the vivid wind pass straight through my body—in other words, blow through without any resistance.
Steam (ST): In that instant, I felt the vivid wind go right through even my body...in other words, blowing through me without any resistance.
PC Japanese (JP): その瞬間、鮮烈な風が、自分の体すらも突き抜けて、つまり妨げられずに吹き抜けるのを感じた。
Russian (RU): В этот момент я ощутила свежий ветер, идущий напролом через моё тело, другими словами, продувавший меня насквозь без всякого сопротивления.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Nesse instante, eu senti um vívido vento passando diretamente através do meu corpo — ou seja, soprando através de mim sem qualquer resistência.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 在那一瞬間，我感受到強風連我的身體都給穿透了，換言之，風毫無阻礙地吹過。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 在那一瞬间，我感受到强风连我的身体都给穿透了，换言之，风毫无阻碍地吹过。

Speaker: Ushiromiya Maria
Steam (ST): "............ ...Yes. Maintain that sensation."
Russian (RU): "...........................Да. Поддерживай в себе это ощущение."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Ange
Umineko Project (UP): "......Yes, I can feel it. ......I can tell that I've been......released from all hindrances."
Steam (ST): "...Yeah, I get it. ...I get that I've been...released from all hinderances."

PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「……えぇ、わかる。……全ての妨げから、解放されてるのが、……わかる」

Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……嗯，明白。……我知道，我已从一切阻碍中，……解放。」

Speaker: Sakutarou
Umineko Project (UP): ‘You did it, Ange, you did it, Ange...! You've taken your first step into the world of witches...!’
Steam (ST): ‘You did it, Ange, you did it...! You've taken your first step into the world of witches...!’
PC Japanese (JP): 『やった縁寿、やった縁寿…！　魔女の世界への、最初の第一歩を踏み出した…！』
Russian (RU): {p:0:『}У тебя получилось, Энджи, получилось!.. Ты сделала первый шаг в мир ведьм!..{p:0:』}
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ‘Você conseguiu, Ange, você conseguiu, Ange...! Deu seu primeiro passo em direção ao mundo das bruxas...!’

Chinese Simplified (CN): 『好棒缘寿、好棒缘寿…！缘寿已踏出了通往魔女的世界的，最初的第一步…！』

Umineko Project (UP): "..................This is...the world of witches......?"
Steam (ST): "......This is...the world of witches...?"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "..................Este é...o mundo das bruxas......?"

Speaker: Ushiromiya Maria
Umineko Project (UP): "Yeah. So, let's try practicing the magic that you've always wished for, Ange. .........Magic to summon friends. ......Magic to create allies who will save you from your loneliness, and thereby bring you happiness."
Steam (ST): "Yeah. So, let's try practicing the magic that you've always wished for, Ange. ......Magic that'll summon friends. ...A magic that'll create allies who'll save you from your loneliness, and thereby bring you happiness."
PC Japanese (JP): 「うん。じゃあ、縁寿がずっと望んできた魔法を、練習してみよう。………お友達を、呼び出す魔法。……縁寿を寂しさから救い出してくれる味方をつくり、それによって幸せになる魔法を。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「うん。じゃあ、縁寿がずっと望んできた魔法を、練習してみよう。………お友達を、呼び出す魔法。……縁寿を寂しさから救い出してくれる味方をつくり、それによって幸せになる魔法を」
Russian (RU): "Да. Итак, приступим к занятиям магией, которая всегда была желанна тобой, Энджи. .........Магия, способная призвать друзей. ......Магия, создающая союзников, которые спасут тебя от одиночества и тем самым принесут тебе счастье."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Sim. Então vamos tentar praticar a magia que você sempre desejou, Ange. .........Magia para invocar amigos. ......Magia para criar aliados que irão salvá‐la de sua solidão, e assim trazer a sua felicidade."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「嗯。那麼，接著我們就來練習一下，緣壽一直在渴望著的魔法。………召喚出朋友的魔法。……創造出會從寂寞中拯救緣壽的伙伴，以此來變幸福的魔法。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「嗯。那么，接着我们就来练习一下，缘寿一直在渴望着的魔法。………召唤出朋友的魔法。……创造出会从寂寞中拯救缘寿的伙伴，以此来变幸福的魔法。」

Speaker: Sakutarou
Umineko Project (UP): ‘Will Ange also be able to summon friends like me?! Uryu‐uryu!’
Steam (ST): ‘Will Ange also be able to summon friends like me?! Uryuuryu!’

Umineko Project (UP): ...So to avoid worsening the mood of my close friend, I had decided to think of {f:5:Beatrice} as nothing more than Onee‐chan's magic master...

PC Japanese (JP): …だから、親友の機嫌を損ねないためにも、ベアトリーチェのことは、お姉ちゃんの魔法の師匠以上には考えないことにしていた…。

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...Por isso, para evitar arruinar o clima entre eu e minha amiga, eu decidi pensar em {f:5:Beatrice} como nada mais do que a mestre em magia da onee‐chan...

Steam (ST): ...I would definitely expose the truth about that someday......

Speaker: Ushiromiya Maria
Umineko Project (UP): "Ange. Obstructions are mingling inside your body again."
Steam (ST): "Ange, obstructions are entering your body again."

PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「縁寿。また体内に妨げが混じってるよ」

Speaker: Ushiromiya Ange
Umineko Project (UP): ".........Sorry, I lost my concentration. ...One more time..."
Steam (ST): "......Sorry, I lost my concentration. ...One more time..."
PC Japanese (JP): 「………ごめんなさい、集中を欠いたわ。…もう一度…。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「………ごめんなさい、集中を欠いたわ。…もう一度…」

Chinese Simplified (CN): 「………对不起，精神有点没集中。…再来一次…」

Umineko Project (UP): Onee‐chan is really something...{n}She instantly noticed that I was being overcome with idle thoughts.
Steam (ST): I'd expect no less from you, Onee-chan... You instantly noticed that I was being overcome with idle thoughts.
PC Japanese (JP): さすがはお姉ちゃん…。私が雑念に囚われたことをすぐに察する。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): さすがはお姉ちゃん…。{n}私が雑念に囚われたことをすぐに察する。

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): A onee‐chan é mesmo incrível...{n}Na mesma hora, ela notou que eu estava sendo superada por pensamentos ociosos.

Chinese Simplified (CN): 不愧是姐姐…。{n}马上就察觉到了，我被杂念所囚。

Steam (ST): After shaking my head just once, I re-imagined the wind blowing through a vast space...

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Depois de sacudir minha cabeça, eu reimaginei o vento soprando através do vasto céu...

Chinese Simplified (CN): 我摇了一下头后，重新想象起了在广大天空中翱翔的风…。

Speaker: Ushiromiya Ange
Umineko Project (UP): "............The Seven Sisters of Purgatory? That's a pretty creepy name."
Steam (ST): "......The Seven Sisters of Purgatory? That's a pretty creepy name."

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "............As Sete Irmãs do Purgatório? Esse é um nome bem assustador."

Chinese Simplified (CN): 「…………炼狱七姐妹？好骇人的名字呢。」

Speaker: Ushiromiya Maria
Umineko Project (UP): "But they're very energetic and fun girls. They might become your new friends, Ange. ......I'll summon them first. Watch."
Steam (ST): "But they're very energetic and fun kids. They might become your new friends, Ange. ...First, I'll show you how to summon them. Watch."
PC Japanese (JP): 「でも、とっても賑やかで楽しい子たちだよ。縁寿の新しいお友達になってくれるかもしれない。……まずは私が呼び出してみせるね。見てて。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「でも、とっても賑やかで楽しい子たちだよ。縁寿の新しいお友達になってくれるかもしれない。……まずは私が呼び出してみせるね。見てて」

Umineko Project (UP): Maria onee‐chan lifted both hands up to the level of her head, and quietly unified her mind.
Steam (ST): Maria onee-chan lifted both hands up to the level of her head...and quietly unified her mind.
PC Japanese (JP): 真里亞お姉ちゃんが、両手を顔の高さに掲げ、静かに精神を統一する。

Steam (ST): ...The state I wasn't able to reach except by meditating for a long period of time, she reached in the span of a few quick breaths.
PC Japanese (JP): ……私が、長い時間を掛けて瞑想しなくては至れない境地に、わずか数回の低い呼吸で至ってしまう。

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......O estado na qual eu não conseguiria alcançar sem meditar por um longo período de tempo, foi alcançado por ela no período de algumas respirações.

Umineko Project (UP): "Wh—?! I, I don't have any i‐interest in something so...fluffy and...squishy and...cuddly, okay?!"
Steam (ST): "Ack!! I, I don't have any i‐interest in something so...fluffy and...squishy and...cuddly, okay?!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「んなッ！！　わ、私は別に、あんなふかふかのプニプニのわふわふなんて、きょ、興味ないんだからあ！」
Russian (RU): "Неправда! Я... я бы не сказала что и... интересуюсь чем‐то столь пушистым, мягким и приятным!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "O q—?! E‐Eu não tenho nenhum tipo de i‐interesse nisso e...tão fofinho e...elástico e...fofinho, ouviu?!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「什——！！我、我對那種軟軟的綿綿的毛茸茸的，沒、沒興趣！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「什——！！我、我对那种软软的绵绵的毛茸茸的，没、没兴趣！」

Speaker: Lucifer
Umineko Project (UP): "Hey!! Be silent in the presence of Lady {f:5:Maria} and Ange‐sama, you cretinous sisters!!"
Steam (ST): "Hey!! Be silent in the presence of Lady {f:5:Maria} and Ange-sama, you foolish sisters!!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「こら！！　マリア卿と縁寿さまの御前よ、静かになさい、この愚妹ども！！」
Russian (RU): "Эй! Не шумите в присутствии Леди {f:5:Марии}, вы, глупые сёстры!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Ei!! Fiquem em silêncio na presença da Lady {f:5:Maria} e da Ange‐sama, suas irmãs cretinas!!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「喂！！這可是在瑪利亞卿與緣壽小姐的駕前，安靜點，你們這幫愚妹！！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「喂！！这可是在玛利亚卿与缘寿小姐的驾前，安静点，你们这帮愚妹！！」

Umineko Project (UP): They were so energetic...{n}The sudden burst of activity as soon they appeared left me stunned.
Steam (ST): They were so energetic... I was shocked by their sudden burst of activity right after they appeared.
PC Japanese (JP): 何と賑やかなことか…。現れて早々の大騒ぎに、私は唖然としてしまう。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 何と賑やかなことか…。{n}現れて早々の大騒ぎに、私は唖然としてしまう。
Russian (RU): Они были такими энергичными...{n}Я оказалась шокирована их внезапной бойкостью после того, как они появились.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Elas são tão energéticas...{n}A súbita explosão de atividades assim que elas apareceram me deixaram desnorteada.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 何其的熱鬧啊…。{n}面對剛一出現就大鬧起來了的她們，我不禁啞然。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 何其的热闹啊…。{n}面对刚一出现就大闹起来了的她们，我不禁哑然。

Umineko Project (UP): And even greater than that was my surprise that the innocent Sakutaro was on such good terms with the Seven Sisters.
Steam (ST): And on top of that, I was surprised that the innocent Sakutaro was on such good terms with the Seven Sisters.
PC Japanese (JP): そしてそれ以上に、無垢なさくたろが、七姉妹たちと仲がいいのに驚いた。
Russian (RU): Вдобавок меня поразило, что невинный Сакутаро был в таких хороших отношениях с семью сёстрами.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): E a minha maior surpresa foi que o inocente Sakutaro tinha uma íntima amizade com as Sete Irmãs.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 此外，比這更讓我驚訝的是，純真無垢的櫻太郎，竟與七姐妹關係不錯。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 此外，比这更让我惊讶的是，纯真无垢的樱太郎，竟与七姐妹关系不错。

Speaker: Ushiromiya Ange
Umineko Project (UP): "......That's unexpected. To think that Sakutaro would be so loved by such a dangerous bunch of people."
Steam (ST): "...That's unexpected. To think that Sakutaro would be so loved by such shady people."
PC Japanese (JP): 「……意外。さくたろが、あんな物騒な連中にこんなに可愛がられてるなんて。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「……意外。さくたろが、あんな物騒な連中にこんなに可愛がられてるなんて」
Russian (RU): "......Как неожиданно. Подумать только, Сакутаро обожают столь сомнительные личности."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Isso é inesperado. E pensar que o Sakutaro seria tão amado por pessoas tão perigosas."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……好意外。櫻太郎竟會受那幫危險的傢伙這般喜愛。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……好意外。樱太郎竟会受那帮危险的家伙这般喜爱。」

Speaker: Ushiromiya Maria
Umineko Project (UP): "They're fellow members of the same alliance. There's nothing to be scared of, you know?"
Steam (ST): "They're fellow members of the same alliance. There's nothing to be scared of, right?"
PC Japanese (JP): 「同じ同盟の仲間たちだもん。怖くなんかないよ？」
Russian (RU): "Они также члены того же союза. Так что чего тут опасаться?"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Elas são grandes companheiras da mesma aliança. Não há nada para se ter medo, sabia?"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「都是同一同盟的伙伴。才不可怕哦？」
Chinese Simplified (CN): [=CHT]

Speaker: Ushiromiya Ange
Umineko Project (UP): "But if Sakutaro were to do something to upset them, it looks like they could finish him off in an instant..."
Steam (ST): "But on the off-chance that their mood worsens, it looks like they could finish Sakutaro off in an instant..."
PC Japanese (JP): 「でも、万が一、彼女らの機嫌を損ねちゃったら、さくたろ、あっという間にやられちゃいそう…。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「でも、万が一、彼女らの機嫌を損ねちゃったら、さくたろ、あっという間にやられちゃいそう…」
Russian (RU): "Но в случае, если у них испортится настроение, они могут прикончить Сакутаро в мгновение ока..."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Mas se o Sakutaro fizer algo para irritá‐las, parece que elas poderiam acabar com ele em um instante..."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「但是，萬一她們心情不好了，櫻太郎就會在轉瞬之間被殺…」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「但是，万一她们心情不好了，樱太郎就会在转瞬之间被杀…」

Speaker: Ushiromiya Maria
Umineko Project (UP): "It's alright. The witches of the alliance and their furniture are all friendly with each other. So Sakutaro can play without worrying. ......Of course, that goes for you and me too, Ange."
Steam (ST): "It's all right. The witches of the alliance and their furniture are all friends. So Sakutaro can play without worrying. ...Of course, that goes for you and me too, Ange."
PC Japanese (JP): 「大丈夫。同盟の魔女とその家具は、みんな仲良しなの。だから、さくたろも安心して遊べるの。……それはもちろん、私や縁寿も同じだよ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「大丈夫。同盟の魔女とその家具は、みんな仲良しなの。だから、さくたろも安心して遊べるの。……それはもちろん、私や縁寿も同じだよ」
Russian (RU): "Всё хорошо. Ведьмы альянса и их мебель дружат. Поэтому Сакутаро может играть с ними без опаски. ......Конечно, это относится и ко мне, и к тебе тоже, Энджи."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Está tudo bem. As bruxas da aliança e suas mobílias são todas amigáveis umas com as outras. Por isso o Sakutaro pode brincar sem se preocupar. ......É claro, isso vale para você e para mim também, Ange."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「沒事的。同盟魔女與其家具，大家都是好朋友。所以，櫻太郎能安心地與她們玩哦。……當然，我與緣壽也一樣喲。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「没事的。同盟魔女与其家具，大家都是好朋友。所以，樱太郎能安心地与她们玩哦。……当然，我与缘寿也一样哟。」

Umineko Project (UP): One of the treaties of Mariage Sorcière.{n}"Mutual nonaggression and noninterference".
Steam (ST): It was one of the pacts of Mariage Sorcière. "Mutual nonaggression and noninterference".
PC Japanese (JP): マリアージュ・ソルシエールの条約の一つ。「相互不可侵、不干渉」。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): マリアージュ・ソルシエールの条約の一つ。{n}「相互不可侵、不干渉」。
Russian (RU): Одно из соглашений Меридж Сорсьер.{n}"Взаимное ненападение и невмешательство".
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Um dos tratados da Mariage Sorcière.{n}"Não agressões e não interferências mútuas".
Chinese Traditional (CHT): Mariage Sorcière 的條約之一。{n}「互不侵犯，互不干涉」。
Chinese Simplified (CN): Mariage Sorcière 的条约之一。{n}「互不侵犯，互不干涉」。

Umineko Project (UP): Member witches must respect each other's magic and creations.
Steam (ST): Member witches must respect each other's magic and creations.
PC Japanese (JP): 所属の魔女は、互いの魔法とその創造物を尊重し合わなくてはならない。
Russian (RU): Ведьмы‐участницы должны уважать магию и творения друг друга.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Bruxas que participam devem respeitar as magias e criações uma das outras.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 同盟所屬魔女必須互相尊重彼此的魔法與創造物。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 同盟所属魔女必须互相尊重彼此的魔法与创造物。

Umineko Project (UP): Even the sisters, who were normally extremely combative and dangerous, interacted with fellow alliance members as friends.
Steam (ST): Even the sisters, who were normally shady and belligerent, treated fellow alliance members as friends.
PC Japanese (JP): 本来は、とても好戦的で物騒な彼女らも、同盟の仲間には友人として接するのだ。
Russian (RU): Даже сёстры, обычно способные быть довольно неприятным и воинственными личностями, взаимодействуют с остальными членами союза как друзья.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Até mesmo as irmãs, que normalmente são extremamente combativas e perigosas, interagem com membros da aliança de forma amigável.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 就連本來非常好戰危險的她們，也會將同盟的伙伴當作朋友對待。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 就连本来非常好战危险的她们，也会将同盟的伙伴当作朋友对待。

Umineko Project (UP): So to the Seven Sisters, Sakutarou was a common friend.
Steam (ST): So, to the Seven Sisters, Sakutarou was a mutual friend.
PC Japanese (JP): だから、七姉妹にとって、さくたろうは共通の友人。
Russian (RU): Так Сакутаро был общим другом семи сестёр.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Por isso, para as Sete Irmãs, o Sakutarou é um amigo em comum.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 所以，對七姐妹來說，櫻太郎是她們共同的友人。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 所以，对七姐妹来说，樱太郎是她们共同的友人。

Umineko Project (UP): He was loved by all of the Seven Sisters, and they were even trying to steal him away from each other.
Steam (ST): He was loved by all of them, and they were even trying to steal him away from each other.
PC Japanese (JP): 七姉妹の誰からも愛され、むしろ奪い合いさえされている。
Russian (RU): Он был любим всеми сёстрами, и они даже пытались украсть его друг у друга.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ele era amado por todas as Sete Irmãs, e elas ficavam tentando roubá‐lo uma das outras.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 受七姐妹每一個人的喜愛，甚至還在被她們爭搶。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 受七姐妹每一个人的喜爱，甚至还在被她们争抢。

Umineko Project (UP): This scene as they all surrounded him and loved him was actually a bit charming.
Steam (ST): This scene as they squeezed him and loved him was a bit charming.
PC Japanese (JP): もみくちゃにされて可愛がられるその光景は、ちょっぴり微笑ましいくらいだ。
Russian (RU): В этом зрелище, как они обнимали и любили его, содержалась некая толика очарования.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Essa cena, com todas o cercando e o amando, era até um pouco charmosa.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 櫻太郎被眾星捧月地擠在中間的情景，能令人自然地流露出微笑。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 樱太郎被众星捧月地挤在中间的情景，能令人自然地流露出微笑。

Speaker: Ushiromiya Ange
Umineko Project (UP): "......I see. They're fellow members of Mariage Sorcière."
Steam (ST): "...I see. They're fellow members of Mariage Sorcière, after all."
PC Japanese (JP): 「……なるほど。マリアージュ・ソルシエールの仲間同士なのね。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「……なるほど。マリアージュ・ソルシエールの仲間同士なのね」
Russian (RU): "......Понятно. Они тоже члены Меридж Сорсьер."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Entendo. Eles são companheiros na Mariage Sorcière."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……原來如此。都是 Mariage Sorcière 的同伴呢。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……原来如此。都是 Mariage Sorcière 的同伴呢。」

Umineko Project (UP): At a glance, you'd think that Sakutaro's easygoing atmosphere and the Seven Sisters' unsettling one would be like water and oil. They looked like they'd never be compatible.
Steam (ST): At a glance, you'd think that Sakutaro's casual atmosphere and the Seven Sisters' shady one would be like water and oil. It looked like they definitely wouldn't be compatible.
PC Japanese (JP): さくたろののんびりした雰囲気と、七姉妹の物騒な雰囲気は、一見しただけなら水と油。絶対に相容れないように見える。
Russian (RU): Сперва напрашивалась мысль, что излучаемая Сакутаро непринуждённая атмосфера и неблаговидность семи сестёр были подобны воде и маслу. Как личности они выглядели абсолютно несовместимыми.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): À primeira vista, você pensaria que o Sakutaro se adaptava a atmosfera, e as inquietantes Sete Irmãs, eram como água e óleo. Parecia que eles nunca seriam compatíveis.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 櫻太郎身上那柔和的氣氛，七姐妹身上那危險的氣氛，一眼看過去就是水與油。絕對不會相容。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 樱太郎身上那柔和的气氛，七姐妹身上那危险的气氛，一眼看过去就是水与油。绝对不会相容。

Umineko Project (UP): And yet, they were interacting in such a friendly way, as if it was completely natural......
Steam (ST): And yet, they were interacting in a friendly way like it was completely natural...
PC Japanese (JP): なのに、こんなにも当たり前のように仲良く交流している……。
Russian (RU): И тем не менее они общались так дружелюбно, будто это было для них вполне естественно...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): E ainda assim, eles estavam interagindo de forma tão amigável, como se fosse completamente natural......
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 可儘管如此，他們卻在如此理所當然地親密交流……。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 可尽管如此，他们却在如此理所当然地亲密交流……。

Umineko Project (UP): If all the peoples of the world could be joined in this wonderful alliance, ......I wonder if the whole world could immediately become friends.
Steam (ST): If this wonderful alliance could join all the peoples of the world together, ...I wonder if everyone in the world would be able to become friends right away.
PC Japanese (JP): この素敵な同盟で、世界の全ての人々を結んだなら、……世界中はすぐに友達になれるのかな。
Russian (RU): Если этот замечательный союз сможет объединить всех людей в мире... Интересно, все ли в мире смогли бы сразу стать друзьями.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Se todas as pessoas do mundo pudessem se juntar a esta maravilhosa aliança, ......eu me pergunto se todos no mundo poderiam se tornar amigos imediatamente.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 如果全世界的人都加入了這個美妙的同盟，……那是否一下子就會變得全世界皆朋友呢？
Chinese Simplified (CN): 如果全世界的人都加入了这个美妙的同盟，……那是否一下子就会变得全世界皆朋友呢？

Speaker: Ushiromiya Maria
Umineko Project (UP): "All you Seven Sisters, listen. Right now, Ange is in the middle of magic training. So I want all of you to lend her your power."
Steam (ST): "All you Seven Sisters, listen. Right now, Ange is in the middle of magic training. So I want everyone to lend their power."
PC Japanese (JP): 「七姉妹のみんな、聞いて。今、縁寿は魔法の修行中なの。だから、みんなの力を貸して欲しいの。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「七姉妹のみんな、聞いて。今、縁寿は魔法の修行中なの。だから、みんなの力を貸して欲しいの」
Russian (RU): "Внимание, семь сестёр. Сейчас Энджи занята магической тренировкой. Поэтому я хочу, чтобы все одолжили свои силы."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Sete Irmãs, ouçam. Agora mesmo, a Ange está no meio de seu treinamento mágico. Por isso, eu quero que todas vocês emprestem seus poderes a ela."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「七姐妹們，聽我說。現在，緣壽正在修行魔法。所以，真里亞希望大家幫幫她。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「七姐妹们，听我说。现在，缘寿正在修行魔法。所以，真里亚希望大家帮帮她。」

Speaker: Lucifer
Umineko Project (UP): "Certainly, Lady {f:5:Maria}. ...But what specifically?"
Steam (ST): "Certainly, Lady {f:5:Maria}. ...But what specifically?"
PC Japanese (JP): 「畏まりました、マリア卿っ。…しかし、具体的には何を？」
Russian (RU): "Конечно, Леди {f:5:Мария}. ...Но на что конкретно?"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Certamente, Lady {f:5:Maria}. ...Mas especificamente o quê?"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「遵命，瑪利亞卿。…不過，請問具體該怎麼做？」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「遵命，玛利亚卿。…不过，请问具体该怎么做？」

Speaker: Ushiromiya Maria
Umineko Project (UP): "I will move the magical power manifesting you from me to Ange. I want you to stay close by her all the time in that state. All you have to do is talk with her and stuff like that."
Steam (ST): "The magical power materializing you will move from me to Ange. In that state, I want you to be by her side all the time. You just have to talk with her."
PC Japanese (JP): 「君たちを顕現させる魔力を、私から縁寿に移すの。その状態で、いつも彼女の身近にいてあげてほしいの。彼女の話し相手になったりしてあげるだけでいい。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「君たちを顕現させる魔力を、私から縁寿に移す。その状態で、いつも彼女の身近にいてあげてほしいの。彼女の話し相手になったりしてあげるだけでいい」
Russian (RU): "Магическая сила, позволяющая вам материализоваться, будет течь от меня к Энджи. Я хочу, чтобы вы всё время были с ней в этом состоянии. Надо просто разговаривать с ней."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Irei mover o poder mágico que manifesta vocês de mim para a Ange. Eu quero que vocês fiquem perto dela o tempo todo, dessa forma. Tudo o que vocês precisam fazer é conversar com ela."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「我會將使你們顯現的魔力，從我身上轉移給緣壽。真里亞希望，你們在這狀態下一直待在她的身邊。只需要當與她說說話的伴就行了。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「我会将使你们显现的魔力，从我身上转移给缘寿。真里亚希望，你们在这状态下一直待在她的身边。只需要当与她说说话的伴就行了。」

Speaker: Lucifer
Umineko Project (UP): ".........My apologies, but with Ange‐sama's magical power, I suspect that it will not be easy for her to continually summon all seven of us around the clock..."
Steam (ST): "......My apologies, but I wonder if Ange-sama's magical power will be able to easily summon all seven of us around the clock..."
PC Japanese (JP): 「………恐れながら。縁寿さまの魔力では、私たち七姉妹全てを、四六時中、呼び出し続けるのは容易なことではないかと…。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「………恐れながら。縁寿さまの魔力では、私たち七姉妹全てを、四六時中、呼び出し続けるのは容易なことではないかと…」
Russian (RU): ".........Мои извинения, но я сомневаюсь, что магической силы Энджи‐сама достанет на круглосуточный призыв всех семерых из нас..."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ".........Minhas desculpas, mas com o poder mágico da Ange‐sama, eu suspeito que isso não será fácil para ela continuar a invocar todas nós facilmente..."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「………恕我冒昧。以緣壽小姐的魔力，將我們全體七姐妹從早到晚一直召喚在身邊並非易事…」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「………恕我冒昧。以缘寿小姐的魔力，将我们全体七姐妹从早到晚一直召唤在身边并非易事…」

Umineko Project (UP): The oldest sister, Lucifer, gauged my reaction as she advised this, speaking reservedly.
Steam (ST): The oldest sister, Lucifer, gazed at my complexion as she advised this, speaking reservedly.
PC Japanese (JP): 長女のルシファーが、遠慮がちな様子で私の顔色をうかがいながら進言する。
Russian (RU): Сдержанно ответила старшая сестра Люцифер, взглянув на мой цвет лица.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): A irmã mais velha, Lucifer, goivou minha reação como se advertise isso, falando reservadamente.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 長女路西法很是恭謙地，邊偷瞧我的臉色，邊如此進言。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 长女路西法很是恭谦地，边偷瞧我的脸色，边如此进言。

Speaker: Ushiromiya Maria

Russian (RU): "Такая уж это тренировка. У Энджи больше таланта к магии, чем все представляют. Думаю, это будет довольно трудно, но считаю, что такой, какой Энджи является сейчас, стоит принять этот вызов."

PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「…うーん…。やっぱり駄目かな。顕現に全精力を使っちゃってる。日常生活と両立できないほどの負荷じゃ意味がない。何しろ、魔女としてこれじゃ、ちょっと優雅じゃないね」
Russian (RU): "...Нет... Всё‐таки так дело не пойдёт. Ты используешь всю свою энергию для их материализации. Это бессмысленно, если ты не можешь сбалансировать такую нагрузку со своей повседневной жизнью. В любом случае, для ведьмы это малость неизящно."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "...Mmmm... Talvez não dê mesmo. Você está usando toda a sua energia para manifestá‐las. Se é um peso que você não consegue balancear com a sua vida cotidiana, então não há sentido. Digo, isso é um pouco...nada refinado para uma bruxa."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「…嗯…。果然不行麼。緣壽全部的精力都用在了顯現上。不能與日常生活共存的負擔是沒有意義的。畢竟，身為魔女，這樣就稍微有點不優雅了。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「…嗯…。果然不行么。缘寿全部的精力都用在了显现上。不能与日常生活共存的负担是没有意义的。毕竟，身为魔女，这样就稍微有点不优雅了。」

Umineko Project (UP): The Seven Sisters started arguing over who should vanish first. ......All the energy of that fight became a burden, imposing an even greater headache upon Ange...

Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……………对不起…。我好像只能勉勉强强召唤你一个。」

Speaker: Mammon
Umineko Project (UP): "Well, I guess I'm alright with that. After all, of all the Seven Sisters, I get the role of Ange‐sama's furniture all to myself. ......What do you think, Ange‐sama? Will I be a burden by myself?"
Steam (ST): "Well, I guess I'm okay with that. After all, of all the Seven Sisters, I get Ange-sama all to myself. ...What do you think, Ange-sama? If it's just me, will it be a burden for you?"
PC Japanese (JP): 「ま、私はこれでもいいかな。だって、七姉妹で私だけが縁寿さまの家具を独り占めだし。……いかがですか、縁寿さま。私ひとりなら負荷にはなりませんか？」
Russian (RU): "Ну, полагаю, я не против. В конце концов, из всех семи сестёр я одна заберу себе всю Энджи‐сама. ......Как думаете, Энджи‐сама? Буду ли я одна в тягость?"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Bem, acho que estou bem assim. Afinal, entre todas as Sete Irmãs, fui eu quem ganhou o papel de mobília da Ange‐sama só para si.{n}......O que você acha, Ange‐sama? Eu sozinha serei um fardo?"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「不過，這倒也不錯。畢竟，在七姐妹中，我一人獨佔了緣壽小姐的家具之座呢。……感覺如何，緣壽小姐？光我一個是不會感到有負擔的吧？」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「不过，这倒也不错。毕竟，在七姐妹中，我一人独占了缘寿小姐的家具之座呢。……感觉如何，缘寿小姐？光我一个是不会感到有负担的吧？」

Speaker: Ushiromiya Ange
Umineko Project (UP): "No, I can manage you alone somehow..."
Steam (ST): "No, I think I'll be able to manage you alone somehow..."
PC Japanese (JP): 「えぇ、あなた一人なら何とかね…。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「えぇ、あなた一人なら何とかね…」
Russian (RU): "Нет, я могу как‐то справляться с одной тобой..."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Não, eu consigo lidar com você sozinha de alguma forma..."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「嗯，光你一個還好…」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「嗯，光你一个还好…」

Speaker: Mammon
Umineko Project (UP): "Great! Then please train a lot and cultivate a lot of magic power. And someday, please let me serve you as one of the fully assembled Seven Sisters. Promise?"
Steam (ST): "Great! Then please train a lot and cultivate your magic power a bunch. Then someday, for sure, please bring the Seven Sisters together and let us serve you. Promise?"
PC Japanese (JP): 「良かったぁ！　なら、いっぱい修行して、いっぱい魔力を養って下さい。そして、いつかきっと七姉妹で揃ってお仕えさせて下さい。約束ですよ？」
Russian (RU): "Замечательно! Тогда, пожалуйста, тренируйтесь больше и как следует развивайте свою магическую силу. Тогда когда‐нибудь, пожалуйста, наверняка призовите остальных сестёр вместе и позвольте нам служить вам. Обещаете?"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Ainda bem! Então, por favor, treine muito e cultive muito poder mágico. E um dia, por favor, deixe‐me servi‐la junto à todas as Sete Irmãs reunidas. Promete?"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「太好了——！那麼，請小姐多加修行，培養出好多好多魔力。總有一天一定要讓我們七姐妹全體集合為您服務。說定了喲？」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「太好了——！那么，请小姐多加修行，培养出好多好多魔力。总有一天一定要让我们七姐妹全体集合为您服务。说定了哟？」

Umineko Project (UP): After checking that there was at least nothing wrong with her own manifestation, Mammon immediately returned to a good mood, and tried to make me promise to work even harder.
Steam (ST): After confirming that, for the time being, her own materialization wasn't causing any issues, Mammon immediately became cheery again and tried to make me promise to work harder.
PC Japanese (JP): マモンは、とりあえず自分の顕現だけは問題ないことを確かめると、すぐに上機嫌に戻り、私にさらなる努力を約束させようとした。
Russian (RU): Убедившись, что её материализация покамест не доставляет неудобств, к Мамоне незамедлительно вернулось хорошее настроение, и она попыталась взять с меня обещание работать усерднее.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Após conferir que ao menos não havia nada de errado com a sua própria manifestação, Mammon imediatamente retomou seu bom humor e tentou me fazer prometer que iria me esforçar ainda mais.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 馬蒙姑且確認了自身的顯現毫無問題後，馬上重新高興了起來，督促我與她約定，去做出更多的努力。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 马蒙姑且确认了自身的显现毫无问题后，马上重新高兴了起来，督促我与她约定，去做出更多的努力。

Umineko Project (UP): Yes, I can see the greed in her.{n}...But maybe you could also call it positivity.
Steam (ST): I see, that definitely fits with her being Greed. ...But maybe you could also call it having a positive attitude.
PC Japanese (JP): なるほど、確かに強欲だ。…でも、前向きとも言えるかもしれない。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): なるほど、確かに強欲だ。{n}…でも、前向きとも言えるかもしれない。
Russian (RU): Ясно, вот какая это штука жадность.{n}...Но, быть может, это также можно назвать предвкушением.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Sim, eu posso ver a ganância nela.{n}...Mas talvez você também possa chamar isso de positividade.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 原來如此，的確很貪婪。{n}…不過，這倒或許也能稱為“向前看”。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 原来如此，的确很贪婪。{n}…不过，这倒或许也能称为“向前看”。

Speaker: Ushiromiya Ange
Umineko Project (UP): "......Yes. I promise. ...I have to be able to do at least that much someday."
Steam (ST): "...Yes. I promise. ...I have to be able to do at least that much someday."
PC Japanese (JP): 「……えぇ。約束するわ。…そのくらいは、いつか出来なくちゃね。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「……えぇ。約束するわ。…そのくらいは、いつか出来なくちゃね」
Russian (RU): "......Да. Обещаю. ...Когда‐нибудь я, по крайней мере, буду способна хотя бы на такое."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Sim. Eu prometo. ...Eu devo ser capaz de ao menos alcançar isto um dia."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……嗯。說定了。…這點事兒，總有一天得做到。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……嗯。说定了。…这点事儿，总有一天得做到。」

Speaker: Mammon
Umineko Project (UP): "Thank you, Ange‐sama! Until that day, I, Mammon the Covetous, will serve you without fail...!"
Steam (ST): "Thank you, Ange-sama! I, Mammon of Greed, will surely serve you until that day...!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「ありがとう、縁寿さま！　この強欲のマモン、その日まで必ず縁寿さまにお仕えします…！」
Russian (RU): "Спасибо, Энджи‐сама! Я, Мамона, она же жадность, буду служить вам с сегодняшнего дня!.."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Obrigada, Ange‐sama! Até que esse dia chegue, eu, Mammon, da Ganância, irei servi‐la sem falhas...!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「謝謝，緣壽小姐！我，貪婪的馬蒙，一定會仕奉緣壽小姐到那一天…！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「谢谢，缘寿小姐！我，贪婪的马蒙，一定会仕奉缘寿小姐到那一天…！」

Umineko Project (UP): My headache finally abated, and I relaxed both hands, which had been clutching at my head.{n}Then Mammon stuck out her hand, and helped me to stand back up...
Steam (ST): My headache finally abated, and I relaxed both hands, which had been clutching at my head. Then Mammon stuck out her hand, helping me stand back up...
PC Japanese (JP): ようやく頭痛が治まり、私は頭を抱えていた両手を解く。するとマモンが手を差し出し、立ち上がるのを手伝ってくれた…。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): ようやく頭痛が治まり、私は頭を抱えていた両手を解く。{n}するとマモンが手を差し出し、立ち上がるのを手伝ってくれた…。
Russian (RU): Моя головная боль наконец утихла, и я расслабила руки, которыми схватилась за голову.{n}Затем Мамона протянула руку, помогая мне встать...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Minha dor de cabeça finalmente diminuiu, e eu pude relaxar ambas as mãos, que estavam apertando minha cabeça.{n}Então, Mammon esticou sua mão, e me ajudou a levantar...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 頭總算是不再痛了，我放開了抱住腦袋的雙手。{n}接著，馬蒙把手伸到我面前，拉我站起身來…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 头总算是不再痛了，我放开了抱住脑袋的双手。{n}接着，马蒙把手伸到我面前，拉我站起身来…。

Speaker: Sakutarou
Umineko Project (UP): ‘Uryu? ......Ah. ......Maria, Ange, look at the time. You'll get told off if you don't go back to the room now.’
Steam (ST): ‘Uryu? ...Ah. ...Maria, Ange, it's about that time. If we don't return to the room, you'll be scolded.’

PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 『うりゅ？　……あ。……真里亞、縁寿、もうこんな時間だよ。もうお部屋に戻らないと、叱られる』
Russian (RU): {p:0:『}Урю? ......Ах. ......Мария, Энджи, уже пора. Если мы не вернёмся в комнату, тебя будут ругать.{p:0:』}
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ‘Uryu? ......Ah. ......Maria, Ange, olhem a hora. Você vai ser repreendida se não voltar para o seu quarto.’

Speaker: Ushiromiya Ange
Chinese Simplified (CN): [=CHT]

Umineko Project (UP): I hadn't expected Sakutaro to talk about the time.{n}......I was brought back into reality.
Steam (ST): I hadn't expected Sakutaro to talk about the time. ...I was brought back into reality.
PC Japanese (JP): さくたろが時間の話なんかするものだから。……私は現実に引き戻される。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): さくたろが時間の話なんかするものだから。{n}……私は現実に引き戻される。

Umineko Project (UP): As though the light had disappeared from it, the vast world sank into the darkness, .........and I was in a tiny, tiny bathroom stall, sitting on a toilet...
Steam (ST): As though the light had disappeared, the vast world sunk into the darkness, ......and I was in a tiny, tiny bathroom stall, sitting on a toilet...
PC Japanese (JP): 広大な世界は、明かりが消えてしまうかのように、ふっと闇に沈み、………私は狭い狭い、トイレの個室に、便座に座っている…。
Russian (RU): Свет словно исчез, огромный мир погрузился во тьму... И я оказалась в маленькой туалетной кабинке, сидя на унитазе...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Como se a luz desaparecesse, o vasto mundo mergulhou na escuridão, .........eu estava em uma pequena cabine do banheiro, sentado na retrete...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 廣大的世界如熄燈般地忽然沉入黑暗，………我坐在了窄窄的廁所單間的馬桶上…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 广大的世界如熄灯般地忽然沉入黑暗，………我坐在了窄窄的厕所单间的马桶上…。

Steam (ST): Onee-chan's grimoire was open on my lap.
PC Japanese (JP): 膝の上には、お姉ちゃんの魔導書が開かれていた。

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): O grimório da onee‐chan estava aberto sobre meu colo.

Chinese Simplified (CN): 我的膝上摆着翻开了的真里亚姐姐的魔导书。

Steam (ST): I looked at the clock. ...It was almost 20:00, time for lights out.
PC Japanese (JP): 時計を見る。……消灯時間の２０時は間近だった。

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eu olhei para o relógio. ......Já era quase 20 h, hora de apagar as luzes.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 看了下表。……已臨近晚上八點的熄燈時間了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 看了下表。……已临近晚上八点的熄灯时间了。

Umineko Project (UP): If I show up late for the roll call before lights out, not only do they make an annoying fuss about it, but it causes trouble for my roommates and floormates as well.
Steam (ST): If I show up late for the roll call before lights out, not only will things get pretty annoying, but it'll cause trouble for my roommates and floormates.
PC Japanese (JP): 消灯前点呼に遅刻すると、色々うるさいだけでなく、ルームメイトやフロアメイトにも迷惑を掛ける。
Russian (RU): Если я опоздаю на перекличку до отбоя, все не только будут раздражены, но это также доставит хлопот моим соседям по комнате и этажу.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Se eu aparecer atrasada para a chamada depois que as luzes se apagarem, não apenas irão fazer um grande alarde, mas também irá causar problemas para minhas colegas de quarto e todas que residem no mesmo andar.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 在熄燈前的點名中遲到，不僅僅會惹禍上身，還會給室友及同樓層的層友添麻煩。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 在熄灯前的点名中迟到，不仅仅会惹祸上身，还会给室友及同楼层的层友添麻烦。

Umineko Project (UP): ......I couldn't care less about causing them trouble, but I'd rather not have to deal with the annoying interference that would come as a result...
Steam (ST): ...I couldn't care less about causing them trouble, but I don't want them messing with me later...
PC Japanese (JP): ……迷惑を掛けること自体はどうでもいいが、彼女らにうるさく干渉されるのはごめんだ…。
Russian (RU): ......Меня не заботят доставляемые им неприятности, но я бы предпочла, чтобы они меня не доставали...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Eu não poderia me importar menos com problemas causados a elas, mas eu prefiro não ter que lidar com a irritante interferência que isso acabaria resultando...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……雖然添麻煩本身無所謂，不過我可不想被她們糾纏干涉…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……虽然添麻烦本身无所谓，不过我可不想被她们纠缠干涉…。

Umineko Project (UP): Hahh............ That's the end of my me‐time for today. I'll go to bed, wake up, tomorrow will begin, and another long, long, gray‐colored day will repeat again.
Steam (ST): *sigh*...... My free time by myself is already over for today. I'll sleep, wake up, tomorrow will begin, and another long, long gray-colored day will repeat again.
PC Japanese (JP): はぁ…………。私だけの、今日の自由な時間は、もうおしまい。寝て、起きれば、明日が始まり、長い長い灰色の一日が再び繰り返される。
Russian (RU): Ха‐а............Моё свободное время на сегодня закончилось. Я засну, проснусь, наступит завтра, и очередной долгий‐долгий серый день повторится опять.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Hahh............ Este é o fim do meu momento a sós de hoje. Irei para cama, acordarei, e amanhã vai começar mais um longo dia acinzentado que se repetirá novamente.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 哈啊…………。只屬於我的，今天的自由時間到此結束了。睡覺、起床，到了明天，又要去重複長長的灰色的一天。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 哈啊…………。只属于我的，今天的自由时间到此结束了。睡觉、起床，到了明天，又要去重复长长的灰色的一天。

Umineko Project (UP): I closed the grimoire and rose from the toilet seat...
Steam (ST): I closed the grimoire and rose from the toilet seat...
PC Japanese (JP): 私は魔導書を閉じ、のろのろと便座から立ち上がる…。
Russian (RU): Закрыв гримуар, я встала с крышки унитаза...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eu fechei o grimório e me levantei do assento do retrete...

Chinese Simplified (CN): 我合上魔导书，慢吞吞地从马桶上站了起来…。

Umineko Project (UP): Onee‐chan appeared again and spoke.
Steam (ST): At that time, Onee-chan appeared again and spoke.

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): A onee‐chan apareceu mais uma vez e falou.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 就在此時，姐姐再次出現，對我說道。

Speaker: Ushiromiya Maria
Umineko Project (UP): "......Come on, Ange. You're forgetting your training. ............Take Mammon with you."
Steam (ST): "...Hey, Ange. You're forgetting your training. ......Take Mammon with you."

PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「……ほら、縁寿。修行を忘れてるよ。…………マモンを連れて行って」

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Vamos, Ange. Você está se esquecendo de seu treinamento. ............Leve a Mammon com você."

Steam (ST): I'd forgotten. ...The moment I'd returned to reality, Mammon's materialization had stopped...

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eu havia esquecido. ...No momento em que eu retornei à realidade, parei de manifestar a Mammon...

Chinese Simplified (CN): 忘了。…一回到现实，就停止了显现马蒙…。

Steam (ST): One more time, I created a strong image of the existence of Mammon in my mind...

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Mais uma vez, eu criei uma forte imagem da existência dela em minha mente...
